research.summary: This document outlines various research-related activities and initiatives, likely from an academic institution. It highlights areas such as research excellence, global engagement, specific research centers like the Galgotias Centre for Interdisciplinary Research, and units like the Research & Development Cell. The text also lists various events, recognitions (like DSIR - SIRO Recognition), publications, awards, and engagement opportunities such as sessions with Nobel Laureates and projects for students. Key themes include interdisciplinary research, international collaborations, and fostering research best practices.

department_overview.summary: Galgotias University's School of Aviation, Logistics, and Tourism Management is dedicated to preparing students for leadership roles in these vital global industries. Offering BBA and MBA programs, along with specialized certifications, the school emphasizes value-based education, research, and innovation to provide an industry-aligned, experiential learning environment that fosters critical skills, ethical thinking, and a global perspective.
department_overview.raw_content:
Enquire Now
Department of Aviation, Logistics & Tourism Management
Charting the Future of Global Industries
Welcome to Galgotias University's pioneering School of Aviation, Logistics, and Tourism Management. In an era of unprecedented connectivity and economic transformation, these three dynamic sectors form the backbone of global commerce and human interaction. Our School is dedicated to nurturing a new generation of transformative leaders, innovators, and professionals who will drive growth, efficiency, and sustainability across these vital industries.
Building upon Galgotias University's legacy of value-based education, research, and innovation, our School brings together a comprehensive suite of BBA and MBA programs alongside specialized short and long-term certification courses. We are committed to delivering an industry-aligned, experiential learning environment that equips our students with the critical skills, ethical mindset, and global perspective needed to excel and make a lasting impact.

accreditations_and_partnerships.summary: This document outlines Galgotias University's commitment to fostering strong relationships with apex and accreditation bodies to provide students with advanced opportunities in research, innovation, and experiential learning. It lists various prestigious organizations with which the university collaborates or has received accreditation, including the National Council for Teacher Education, Pharmacy Council of India, The Indian Association of Physiotherapists, Association of Indian Universities, NAAC (with A+ accreditation), NBA, Association to Advance Collegiate Schools of Business, University Grants Commission, All India Council for Technical Education, The Bar Council of India, and Indian Nursing Council.
accreditations_and_partnerships.raw_content:
Apex and Accreditation Bodies
Cultivating formidable partnerships with Apex and Accreditation Bodies to empower students with cutting-edge opportunities in research, innovation, and experiential learning excellence

student_life.summary: This text highlights the vibrant student life and opportunities available at a university, including involvement in student councils and groups, a large incubation center fostering over 100 startups, advanced tech laboratories, and top-tier sports facilities and diverse extracurricular programs designed to help students learn, grow, and unleash their potential.
student_life.raw_content:
Student Council & Groups
Be Part of a Vibrant Community: Our student council and groups offer opportunities to connect, learn, and grow outside of the classroom. Discover how you can get involved today.
Building the Next Big Thing: With 100+ Start-ups, Our incubation center is one of the India’s largest where innovation and entrepreneurship thrive. Join us in creating the future of business, technology, and social impact.
Explore the Future of Tech: Our tech laboratories offer state-of-the-art equipment and expert faculty to guide you in exploring the latest advancements in tech. Start your journey today.
Unleash your potential with world-class sports facilities and diverse extracurricular programs at our leading university.
Embrace the Opportunities of Our Dynamic Sports and Extracurricular Scene
Take your Game to the Next Level with our Top-Notch Sports Infrastructure
